name: Disable Grunion Admin link
author: Ryan Hellyer

sections.installation:
After you’ve downloaded and extracted the files:

  1. Upload the complete plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory OR install via the WordPress plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The feedbacks link should now be remove from your admin menu.

Visit the Disable Grunion Admin link page for more information.

Please note that we are not accepting unpaid requests for improvements or unpaid support for this plugin. The Disable Grunion Admin link plugin was created for a specific site and we do not have time to provide free technical assistance for it unfortunately.
sections.description:
However … some of you may not like the addition of an extra link in your WordPress admin menu which this new version includes. So to avoid this problem, you can simply install the “Disable Grunion Admin link” plugin to have that extra admin menu link replaced with a less obtrusive one which can be found under “Dashboard”.

Please note that we are not accepting unpaid requests for improvements or unpaid support for this plugin. The Disable Grunion Admin link plugin was created for a specific site and we do not have time to provide free technical assistance for it unfortunately.

History

Version 1.2.1 Adding deprecated notice, adding an icon, fixing function names and changign domain ( 21/12/2014)
Version 1.2 Fixed link under “Dashboard” ( 15/4/2012)
Version 1.1 Added unobtrusive link for Form Feedbacks under “Dashboard” ( 27/1/2011)
Version 1.0 Initial plugin release ( 24/12/2010)

Credits

Thanks to the developers of the original Grunion Contact form plugin. It is unfortunate they decided to kill of a great little plugin.
